languages.text: "Нет! Предательство можно смыть только кровью. Тем, кто отверг Императора, нет пути назад!"

traits.locale_text: "Нет! Предательство можно смыть только кровью. Тем, кто отверг Императора, нет пути назад!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: "Нет! Предательство можно смыть только кровью. Тем, кто отверг Императора, нет пути назад!"

traits.locale_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “不行！叛国的重罪必须用鲜血洗刷，背叛帝皇的人是没有退路的。”
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “不行！叛国的重罪必须用鲜血洗刷，背叛帝皇的人是没有退路的。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「いいや！反逆を洗い流せるのは血だけだ。皇帝を放棄した者はもう、後戻りは出来ない！」
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいや！反逆を洗い流せるのは血だけだ。皇帝を放棄した者はもう、後戻りは出来ない！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡No! Lo único que puede borrar la traición es la sangre. ¡No hay vuelta atrás para aquellos que han renunciado al Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No! Lo único que puede borrar la traición es la sangre. ¡No hay vuelta atrás para aquellos que han renunciado al Emperador!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Nein! Nur Blut kann Hochverrat fortwaschen. Für jene, die dem Imperator abgeschworen haben, gibt es keinen Weg zurück!"
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Nur Blut kann Hochverrat fortwaschen. Für jene, die dem Imperator abgeschworen haben, gibt es keinen Weg zurück!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Non ! Seul le sang peut laver la trahison. Il n'y a pas de rédemption possible pour ceux qui ont renié l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Seul le sang peut laver la trahison. Il n'y a pas de rédemption possible pour ceux qui ont renié l'Empereur ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hayır! İhaneti yalnızca kan temizler. İmparator'u terk edenler için geri dönüş yoktur!"
languages.original_text: "No! Only blood can wash away treason. There is no way back for those who have renounced the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır! İhaneti yalnızca kan temizler. İmparator'u terk edenler için geri dönüş yoktur!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
